alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 3:40PM EST until January 30 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Western Franklin MA County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight EST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
